description: Support for Sustainable Development of Livestock Sector in Uzbekistan

subproject.corporate outcome: Development plans and programmes integrate environmentally sustainable solutions in a manner that promotes poverty reduction, MDG achievement and low-emission climate-resilient development
subproject.description: Improved national capacity in sustainable livestock breeding, through deminstration of practical skills. A comprehensive analysis of the sector to support Government in defining options for developing an effective and sustainable set of policies on livestock infrustructure development. Project objectives: 1. Create a better regulatory and institutional framework through provision of necessary changes into existing laws and policies that will enable livestock sector to function efficiently under market conditions; 2. Enhance capacity of farmers and dehkhans through demonstration of best management practices in livestock breeding and management; 3. Increase efficiency of livestock production through establishment of service structures (artificial insemination and veterinary service) at the local level.
subproject.gender code: No noticeable contribution to gender equality
subproject.title: Livestock Development in Uzb
